name: Joël M. H. Karel
content: Joël Karel Joël Karel Associate Professor at the Department of Advanced Computing Sciences, Maastricht University. Coordinator Systems & Control Research Area Governance board member for the Thematic Digital Competence Centre (TDCC) for the Natural & Engineering Sciences (NES) LinkedIn Developing signal processing methods. This involves applying them in the biomedical field including the machine learning / artificial intelligence pipeline. Wavelet theory Time-frequency decompositions such as Singular Spectrum Decomposition Electrocardiographic Imaging (ECGI) Systems theory Recurrence plots Data analysis Please find a list of my publications on the following sources: Google Scholar Cris (Maastricht University) ORCID Please note that some non-open access publications can be obtained through Cris due to the Taverne Amendment. Yes, this site is minimalistic. Yes, it is intended as such :)
